author: Staff Reporter
text:
Eight sovereigns of gold jewellery and Rs. 1.1 lakh cash were stolen from a house near Othakadai on Saturday.

According to a complaint filed by P. Murugeswari (40), a flower vendor from Alagappa Nagar in Othakadai, she and her husband, who works in a tea shop, had gone for work on Saturday morning.

When they came back in the afternoon for lunch, they found the lock of the door broken, she said.

They found that two trunk suitcases broken open and 8.25 sovereigns of gold jewellery and Rs 1.1 lakh cash stolen from them.

The Othakadai police have registered a case in this regard.
title: Gold and cash stolen from house
